characters: What the hell are you wearing
How much does it cost then
Then she ate Alfred for dinner
Why is she taking him back
Was it hard or soft tortilla

dialogue.text: Oh, Kiara! Kiara! Kiara!
Do you take the bat Kiara and love her in sickness and in health?
I hereby declare you wife and pet.
Kiara! Kiara!
You may kiss the bat.
Kiara? Kiara, is that you?
No!
Good morning! Looks like it was a cozy dream.
Mm, super cozy.
–Old man, this came for you today. –Mhm?
It’s a really nice envelope.
–Who do you think it’s from? –Probably Eric and them.
It’s too nice to be from Eric, right?
Screw the pie, Mom.
B.S.T.
I mean, I didn’t mean to invite myself.
You mean when you called and asked to come here for lunch?
Exactly. I didn’t think it would happen so fast, but of course I’m coming.
You can say no if you want.
We barely know each other and my family is a bit… special.
Of course not. It’s so cool.
I’ve never been to a vampire castle before.
Okay. Welcome to Natt and Dag. Blood and honor.
Yes! Yes!
How nice that we get your first human friend over for dinner.
Yo, Mom!
–Looks good, right?
dialogue.speaker: What the hell are you wearing

dialogue.text: Looks good? It was ugly even for you.
Where are you going? World Championship of weird jackets or what?
Yo, channel. Going to a dinner. Lunch at the Natt and Dag family.
–Stop filming, Affe. –Here’s my driver who’s super pissed.
But come on, I don’t get it.
–You’re my driver.
dialogue.speaker: Why am I here

dialogue.text: We need to roll up with some class and style.
–Damn it!
dialogue.speaker: Come on now

dialogue.text: You’re completely fucking unbelievable, Affe.
Do I really have to come and open your damn door?
–Yeah, I guess I’ll film then.
dialogue.speaker: Film now

dialogue.text: Hurry up, damn it! You’re supposed to be the mascot at the match later.
–Come on, it’s a match!
dialogue.speaker: Mascot

dialogue.text: –What party?
dialogue.speaker: And then party after

dialogue.text: The village hall party you’re supposed to come to.
I probably can’t tonight, and I’m probably not invited.
But come on… Elise is going.
–So I’m your wingman? –No, that might be a bit much.
Hurry up now. I’m not waiting more than 30 minutes.
–37.5. –Hurry the hell up!
Hi.
Welcome. Come in.
–Thanks.
dialogue.speaker: Nice house

dialogue.text: Nice… suit.
And here’s my family.
–Wilf?
dialogue.speaker: What a fucking wilf

dialogue.text: –Nothing. Nothing.
dialogue.speaker: What is it

dialogue.text: My family has lived here since 1327.
And here’s my dance hall.
Wow! Is that who I think it is?
I don’t know who you think it is, but it’s my grandmother.
Is Countess Dracula your grandmother?
Yes, or she was the brains behind Count Dracula.
Didn’t Dracula have, like, three brides or something?
Yes. That’s why she killed him… with that.
You mean that…?
Yes, it’s the stake, the stake that killed Count Dracula.
I’ve heard that you like tacos, Alfred.
–Mm…
dialogue.speaker: I eat them every Friday

dialogue.text: Interesting. Just let us know if anything’s missing.
Yes, we want to show appreciation for your human culture,
and serve something you like. Taccos.
–Tacos.
dialogue.speaker: Tacos

dialogue.text: I could have gone for banana.
Enough with the banana.
Yes, Alfred, you’ll take good care of our daughter, I understand.
Absolutely. I show her around everywhere at school and stuff.
And we’re going to a party later.
Study party.
Reading and studying and stuff.
Kiara is so happy to have met a human friend.
–And you seem so open-minded. –And fearless.
Yeah, I like vampires.
Sorry. Cold-bloods.
It’s fine to say vampires.
We’re proud to be called vampires.
It’s humans who came up with that nonsense about cold-bloods.
Well, here at the Natt and Dag family we usually entertain our guests.
Kiara, maybe you could dance for our guest?
But Mom!
Do you have a favorite piece, young man?
Absolutely. “Crazy Frog”.
Oh, interesting choice. We should be able to arrange that.
Enough with the “Crazy Frog”.
Ah!
That went well.
Jack…
Alfred, run!
–Go, Eric! Drive! Go! Go! –What the hell are you doing?
Drive!
Batgirls is the dance school’s elite group,
and this year it’s you who are the school’s pride.
Super good job!
These are Batgirls’ competition costumes. We wear them with pride.
Not just anyone can be a Batgirl.
We’ve never had a guy in Batgirls before,
so we don’t have any guy clothes.
–But we’ll figure it out, of course.
dialogue.speaker: Too bad for you

dialogue.text: With what money then were you thinking, or?
Don’t worry about it anymore.
It went fine. I barely had to sew anything.
Probably no one will even notice.
But I’m embarrassed about my parents.
No, don’t be. It was so cool.
It was super embarrassing.
Are you sure no one is talking about it?
Yes.
I told you. Vampires are deadly.
You’re exaggerating. It was an accident.
Are you kidding? Twice in a row!
First she ate everyone at the whole dance school.
–It was lunch.
dialogue.speaker: Then she ate Alfred for dinner

dialogue.text: Alfred comes running completely stressed out.
His whole hand was bloody.
I didn’t know what to do. So I’m going to go with that too.
I mean, Eric just skidded off at 120 kilometers per hour.
Alfred filmed everything! Everything! And Dracula’s killer was there too.
Is it on YouTube?
–And Snap.
dialogue.speaker: TikTok

dialogue.text: You promise it’s only Eric who knows about it.
Promise.
Or yeah, I might have accidentally told someone else. Just one.
–Yes!
dialogue.speaker: But is it true

dialogue.text: I was at lunch at the family’s, and the brother was completely crazy.
What did you eat then?
Tacos.
–Then the butler played “Crazy Frog”. –I heard it! On a cello.
It’s violin.
–Didn’t you have to sew anything? –Three stitches.
At least three days without anesthesia.
–Soft.
dialogue.speaker: Was it hard or soft tortilla

dialogue.text: This party I’m going to…
–I’ve never been to a party before. –The village hall party.
–Hello, there’s a party tonight. –What if she comes.
–Ew! How do we get there? –I can drive.
No, we’re skipping it.
It’s only Eric who wants to go and hang out with Elise.
–What? Why?
dialogue.speaker: I want to go

dialogue.text: But maybe I’m not welcome after everything that’s happened.
Sure you are. They’ve already forgotten.
The bloodsucker Kiara isn’t welcome anyway.
Everyone’s going. It’s going to be so fun.
Yeah, but village hall parties are so lame.
–Yeah, I agree.
dialogue.speaker: Yeah

dialogue.text: –But we’re going, right? –Of course we are.
Adam, I have bad news.
You need to pay for your competition costume yourself.
–It’s not that expensive.
dialogue.speaker: How much does it cost then

dialogue.text: –Maybe 11,000. –Excl. VAT.
–But I don’t have 11,000. –Pookie…
It’s not your fault that you’re so poor.
We’ll find someone else.
What are you studying? I baked.
Ugh! Damn, I’m driving.
Damn, are you here too? Hi!
–What…? Are you studying, or? –Yeah, what does it look like?
Shh! We speak in small letters in this house.
–Did you want something, or? –No, no.
Or yeah, I have something for you.
I actually baked. Lactose-free, of course. I’m sorry.
Oh… Sorry, pastries, they’re not allowed in here.
No.
–Yeah.
dialogue.speaker: Keep them in the bag

dialogue.text: –For saying we weren’t together.
dialogue.speaker: For what

dialogue.text: And the other thing too, of course.
–Yeah, but it’ll probably be fine.
dialogue.speaker: Sorry

dialogue.text: –See you at the village hall party, right?
dialogue.speaker: I have to go now

dialogue.text: It’ll be fun. –Yeah.
dialogue.speaker: Mm

dialogue.text: By the way, it’s Chloe who’s lactose. I’m gluten.
Damn!
–That wasn’t awkward at all. –No.
I want to warn you there might be a dance circle later.
What’s that? –You don’t know what a dance circle is?
dialogue.speaker: A dance circle

dialogue.text: Okay, it’s about there being a big circle
and then people go in two by two. Do you get what I mean?
I can’t take any more. You can go.
But I don’t know what to wear tonight.
You have to wear a dress and high heels.
But I thought that… –Yup. You need rhinestones too.
dialogue.speaker: Do they

dialogue.text: Or slits or whatever it’s called. Gala attire, luxury, lipstick.
That’s standard at village hall parties.
A-brunn!
What is that?
If you touch an A-brunn you get anal sex or bad luck?
–It’s a bit unclear. –What?
It’s kind of like God wants. Come on.
I’m so nervous about the party.
Good thing I have you who knows what’s up.
Otherwise I would have shown up in jeans and a top.
That’s what friends are for.
And by the way, don’t worry about the haters.
I’m trying, but sometimes I wish I wasn’t a vampire.
Don’t say that!
It’s so cool to be a vampire, and a little scary.
See you later!
Gross!
So mature of Elise to forgive Eric, despite everything. So big of her.
Yeah, they’re so cute together.
I mean, so embarrassing.
–Can’t they just give up sometime?
dialogue.speaker: Why is she taking him back

dialogue.text: Can’t even look. So cringe.
Come on, Affe. Pull yourself together.
She might think she’s not invited because she’s a cold-blood.
Yeah, you’re probably right.
She doesn’t really like that much attention anyway.

characters: Last one up is an idiot
Of course everyone should get a chance
Sounds like you have a new friend

dialogue.text: –Hi, Affe. –Hi, Kiara.
What do we do now?
Because if you lose courage and fall to your knees
you can rest here with me
Look at this.
Like a rock in the storm to lean on
And I will never let you down
I will follow you through fire and water, over land and sea
I will love you until my heart stops beating
And we hate AIK!
From the highest mountain to the deepest valley I will go
She was so hot tonight.
Yeah, vampires are still pretty cool.
I know. And she’s good at dancing too.
Yeah, she’s better than Chloe.
I think I’ve actually changed my mind. I like Kiara now.
/TOILET FLUSHING/
–And?
dialogue.speaker: Sounds like you have a new friend

dialogue.text: Maybe she can take your spot in Batgirls.
I think Chloe is changing tactics now.
I will follow you through fire and water, over land and sea
I will love you until my heart stops beating
Through time and space Yes, all my days…
So you’ve changed your mind? –No, I’ve always thought that.
dialogue.speaker: What

dialogue.text: –But how do we do that then?
dialogue.speaker: Of course everyone should get a chance

dialogue.text: Kiara. She’s a perfect member.
She’s cool, rich, hot and diversity, like the principal wants.
I really want to give her a chance.
You there, bitch ass. Move!
Nice dress you’ve got.
I would never have been comfortable in that one.
–Thanks! –I just wanted to say you’re awesome.
–Yeah. I just need to keep a high level.
dialogue.speaker: You think so

dialogue.text: Some people think I push a bit too hard,
but it’s for Batgirls’ best. Do you want to be in?
And dance? I didn’t think I passed the audition.
I get to choose who I want. You can take Adam’s spot.
I think it’s completely right for you. Congratulations!
However, you have to dump that nerd.
Who? –Come on, you get it.
dialogue.speaker: What

dialogue.text: The nerd. Lame-Alfred.
–Oh… Yeah. –He’s not good for our reputation.
Hello, hello! Can everyone look over here for a second?
So I’ve dedicated a song
to a very special person here inside.
Come! Let’s go.
I can only say this: You know who you are.
Come on!
There’s a guy at this school who’s obsessed with vampires
Kiara, why don’t you run away Alfred has a bowl cut
Alfred is a nerd!
Alfred is a nerd!
N-n-n-n-n-n-nerd! N-n-n-n-n-n-nerd!
Because Alfred is a nerd!
–Already? I thought they were pretty good.
dialogue.speaker: Should we leave

dialogue.text: Come on!
For Kiara he has feelings
but he always ends up in the friendzone
Kiara, get pepper spray because Alfred wants to bang you
Alfred is a nerd!
Alfred, he’s disturbed!
N-n-n-n-n-n-nerd! N-n-n-n-n-n-nerd!
Because Alfred is a nerd!
No, not again.
/WET FART/
Because Alfred is a nerd!
–Want to borrow my hoodie, or? –No, it’s fine.
But you can warm me up in another way.
–So we’re back together! –If everything wasn’t so complicated.
And if I just wasn’t so damn clumsy all the time.
What are you looking at? Ignore them.
I don’t want to be like that, but you should really go home now.
Shouldn’t you too? My parents won’t notice anything.
–It’s not them I’m thinking about. –Don’t worry about him.
Don’t worry about a bloodthirsty big brother.
Please Alfred, you’re my guide.
Okay then.
It’s open.
–Eric! The gate is open! –Come on, let’s go swimming!
Hi boys! Come on!
Damn, how childish!
Jump in then. Vampires can’t handle water?
–Yeah, but I don’t want to get my hair wet. –Bath wimp!
But tell me why you like vampires so much.
Because they’re cool, hot, rich, fast.
Thanks!
–Yo! –Come on, tell me now.
Stop nagging. I can’t be bothered to tell it.
Tell me why vampires are so rich instead.
Now we’re doing the sauna, guys.
–Get up!
dialogue.speaker: Last one up is an idiot

dialogue.text: –Come on, let’s go!
dialogue.speaker: No

dialogue.text: –Damn, it’s so hot! –Yeah thanks, I can see that.
–I can’t take any more. –Damn, you’re so red.
–Not as red.
dialogue.speaker: You too

dialogue.text: –Don’t rub against me! –It smells like balls in here.
–But now it’s your turn to tell. –But it’s not that fun.
It’s kind of a party killer actually.
Okay. Something happened when I was little. An accident.
Hey there.
Damn, it’s so hot. I’m so fucking sweaty.
Guys!
Guys! Guys!
Help! Help!
–Help! –What are you doing?
Help! Help!
Eric!
–Eric! Eric! –Do something!
Help! Crisis-vamp!
Subtitles: Iyuno for SVT
